game.name: Three Jokers
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A card roguelike inspired by Balatro and Cuphead. Fight duels, play insane mini-games, build Joker City and rise to greatness — in Three Jokers!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A card roguelike inspired by Balatro and Cuphead. Fight duels, play insane mini-games, build Joker City and rise to greatness — in Three Jokers!
